examples.example: 真的很抱歉给您带来了困扰，我会尽快解决问题的。

translate.english: Really very sorry to have brought you trouble, I will solve the problem as soon as possible.

examples.example: 我不小心犯了错误，赶紧向对方说抱歉。

translate.english: I made a mistake carelessly and quickly said sorry to the other party.

examples.example: 我为我的迟到向大家表示抱歉，希望没有耽误大家太多时间。

translate.english: I apologize to everyone for my being late and hope I haven't delayed everyone too much time.
